call_summary: ADA Policy Violation - Agent apologized after ADA disclosure

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Jonathan. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: Hi, I'd like to make a payment on my credit card.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I have a speech disability, please be patient with me

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me see what I can do.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: That's not helpful. I need assistance now.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me transfer you to my supervisor.
